content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Greetings, thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
It's 600 Euro per month, with a contract of 12 months. If I want to break the contract earlier, I have to pay a penalty of 100 Euro per month.

Now, let's see if we can reach an agreement. What do you think?

Do you agree to 600 Euro per month?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your proposal. While I appreciate your offer, I must admit that I am still considering other rental options. I will need some time to make a decision. Could you provide me with some time to consider your proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Of course, I understand. Please let me know if you agree to the rental price of 600 Euro. If not, please let me know when you decide to terminate the negotiation.

I will also provide you with more information about the apartment, such as its location, size, and amenities. Please feel free to ask any questions you may have.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your understanding. I will need some time to review the information you provide and consider your proposal. If I do decide to agree to the rental price of 600 Euro per month, I will let you know. If not, I will inform you when I decide to terminate the negotiation. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine
